name: On Hybrid Shorts - Men's
description: Can't decide on tights or shorts? Wear both! These performance 2-in-1 shorts feature a supportive tight with a light outer short. The button attachment system lets you secure both layers together, or wear them individually. This system is also compatible with other On modular apparel.Ultralight polyester outer shorts are quick to dry.Supportive inner tights for chafe-free wear.Attachment system allows you to separate each layer.Double pockets on each short for carry options.
